description: This course offers a continuation of group theory and field theory, including group actions, Sylow theory, and Galois theory. Other topics may include representation theory, module theory and more, depending on the instructor. Prerequisite: Math 252. Offered in 2008-09 and alternate years.
name: Abstract Algebra II
prerequisites: Math 252. Offered in 2008-09 and alternate years.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Math 252. Offered in 2008-09 and alternate years.
